sqlMap.insert: INSERT INTO CLASS_DETAIL ( class_detail_id, class_master_id, student_id, teacher_id, song, type, date, time, hw, teacher_note, student_note, updater, update_time ) VALUES ( #class_detail_id#, #class_master_id#, #student_id#, #teacher_id#, #song#, #type#, #date#, #time#, #hw#, #teacher_note#, #student_note#, #updater#, #update_time# )
sqlMap.select: SELECT class_detail_id,class_master_id,student_id,teacher_id,(SELECT name FROM person WHERE person_id=student_id)as student_name,(SELECT name FROM person WHERE person_id=teacher_id)as teacher_name,song,type,date,time,hw,teacher_note,student_note,updater,update_time FROM CLASS_DETAIL class_detail_id = #class_detail_id# class_master_id = #class_master_id# student_id = #student_id# teacher_id = #teacher_id# song = #song# type = #type# date = #date# time = #time# hw = #hw# teacher_note = #teacher_note# student_note = #student_note# updater = #updater# update_time = #update_time# date >= #today# time > #now_time# ORDER BY $order$ $fromIndex$, $rowLimit$ $rowLimit$
sqlMap.update: UPDATE CLASS_DETAIL class_detail_id = #class_detail_id# class_master_id = #class_master_id# student_id = #student_id# teacher_id = #teacher_id# song = #song# type = #type# date = #date# time = #time# hw = #hw# teacher_note = #teacher_note# student_note = #student_note# updater = #updater# update_time = #update_time# WHERE class_detail_id = #class_detail_id#
